questionsSolved.userSolution:
SELECT
  first_name
FROM patients
WHERE first_name like 'C%';

SELECT
  first_name, last_name
FROM patients
WHERE weight between 100 AND 120;
update patients set allergies='NKA' where allergies is null;
select concat(first_name, " ", last_name) as fullname from patients

select pt.first_name, pt.last_name, pr.province_name 
from patients pt INNER JOIN province_names pr On pt.province_id=pr.province_id
select count(*) from patients where year(birth_date) = 2010

SELECT
  first_name,
  last_name,
  max(height)
FROM patients

SELECT *
FROM patients where patient_id in (1,45,534,879,1000)

SELECT count(*)
FROM admissions

SELECT *
FROM admissions where admission_date = discharge_date

SELECT patient_id, count(*)
FROM admissions group by(patient_id) having patient_id=579

SELECT distinct city
FROM patients where province_id='NS'

SELECT first_name, last_name, birth_date city
FROM patients where height > 160 AND weight > 70;

SELECT first_name, last_name, allergies
FROM patients where allergies IS NOT null AND city = 'Hamilton';
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients where gender='M'

SELECT
  distinct Year(birth_date) as birth_year
FROM patients order by birth_year

SELECT
  first_name 
FROM patients group by first_name having count(*) = 1

SELECT
  patient_id, first_name
FROM patients where first_name like 's%s' and len(first_name) >= 6

SELECT
  p.patient_id, first_name, last_name
FROM patients p INNER JOIN admissions a ON p.patient_id= a.patient_id
where a.diagnosis = 'Dementia';

SELECT
  first_name
FROM patients order by len(first_name) asc, first_name asc

SELECT
  count(CASE when gender = 'M' then 1 end) as total_male_patients, 
  count(case when gender = 'F' then 1 end) as total_female_patients
FROM patients

SELECT
  first_name, last_name, allergies
FROM patients where allergies IN('Penicillin', 'Morphine')
order by allergies, first_name, last_name

SELECT
  patient_id, diagnosis
FROM admissions 
group by diagnosis, patient_id having count(*) > 1

SELECT
  city, 
  count(*) as total_patients
FROM patients 
group by city 
order by total_patients desc, city asc;

SELECT
  p.first_name, p.last_name, 'Patient' As role 
FROM patients p
union ALL 
select 
  d.first_name, d.last_name, 'Doctor' as role from doctors d;

SELECT
  first_name, last_name, birth_date
FROM patients 
where Year(birth_date) between 1970 And 1979
order by birth_date

SELECT
  allergies,
  count(*) as total_diagnosis
FROM patients 
WHERE allergies IS NOT NULL 
group by allergies
order by total_diagnosis desc;

SELECT
  concat(upper(last_name), "," , lower(first_name)) as full_name
FROM patients 
order by first_name desc;

SELECT
  province_id, sum(height) as total_height
FROM patients 
group by province_id having total_height >= 7000;

SELECT
 (max(weight) - min(weight))  as differnce 
 from patients where last_name = 'Maroni'

SELECT
 day(admission_date)  as date_number,
 count(*) total_admission
 from admissions 
 group by date_number
 order by total_admission desc;

SELECT *
 from admissions 
where patient_id=542 
order by admission_date desc
limit 1

SELECT patient_id, attending_doctor_id, diagnosis
 from admissions 
where (patient_id % 2 != 0 
AND attending_doctor_id IN (1, 5, 19)) 
OR (attending_doctor_id like '%2%'  AND len(patient_id) = 3)

SELECT 
d.doctor_id,
concat(d.first_name, " ", d.last_name) as fullname, 
max(admission_date) as last_attended, min(admission_date) as first_attended
 from doctors d INNER JOIN 
 admissions a ON a.attending_doctor_id=d.doctor_id 
 group by doctor_id;

SELECT 
pr.province_name as province_name, 
count(*) as total_patients
 from patients pt INNER JOIN 
 province_names pr ON pt.province_id=pr.province_id
 group by (pt.province_id)
 order by total_patients desc;

SELECT 
concat(p.first_name , " " , p.last_name) as patient_name,
a.diagnosis,
concat(d.first_name, " ", d.last_name) as doctor_name
FROM patients p 
JOIN admissions a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id
JOIN doctors d ON d.doctor_id = a.attending_doctor_id

SELECT first_name, last_name, count(*)
from patients p
group by first_name, last_name having count(*) > 1

SELECT 
concat(first_name, " ", last_name) as full_name, 
Round(height / 30.48, 1),
round(weight * 2.205 , 0),
birth_date,
CASE When gender = 'M' Then 'MALE' ELSE 'FEMALE' END as result
from patients p

SELECT 
patient_id,
first_name,
last_name
from patients p where patient_id NOt In (select patient_id from admissions)

SELECT
    FLOOR(weight / 10) * 10 as weight_group,
    COUNT(*) AS total_patients
FROM patients
GROUP BY weight_group
ORDER BY
    FLOOR(weight / 10) * 10 DESC;

SELECT
    patient_id, weight, height,
    CASE 
    	when weight/(power(height / 100.0, 2)) >= 30 then 1 
        else 0 
    End as isObese
FROM patients

SELECT
    a.patient_id, 
 	p.first_name, 
    p.last_name, 
    d.specialty
    from admissions a 
    JOIN doctors d ON d.doctor_id=a.attending_doctor_id
    join patients p on p.patient_id = a.patient_id
    where a.diagnosis = 'Epilepsy' AND d.first_name = 'Lisa'

SELECT
    Distinct p.patient_id, 
    concat(p.patient_id, Len(p.last_name), year(p.birth_date)) as temp_password
    from patients p 
    join admissions a on p.patient_id = a.patient_id

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN a.patient_id % 2 = 0 THEN 'Yes'  
        ELSE 'No' 
    END AS has_insurance,
    CASE 
        WHEN a.patient_id % 2 = 0 THEN COUNT(*) * 10  
        ELSE COUNT(*) * 50 
    END AS cost_after_insurance
FROM admissions a
GROUP BY a.patient_id % 2;

SELECT pr.province_name
	from province_names pr
    join patients pt on pt.province_id=pr.province_id
    group by pr.province_name 
    having 
    count(CASE when pt.gender = 'M' then 1 end) > 
    count(CASE when pt.gender = 'F' then 1 end)

SELECT *
	from patients 
    where first_name like '__r%'
    And gender = 'F'
    AND month(birth_date) in (2, 5, 12)
    and weight between 60 and 80
    AND patient_id % 2 != 0
    and city = 'Kingston'

WITH daily_admissions AS (
    SELECT 
        admission_date,
        COUNT(*) AS total_admissions
    FROM admissions
    GROUP BY admission_date
)
SELECT 
    admission_date,
    total_admissions,
    total_admissions - LAG(total_admissions) OVER (ORDER BY admission_date) AS admissions_change
FROM daily_admissions;

select province_name 
from province_names 
order by 
	case when province_name = 'Ontario' then 0 else 1 end,
province_name

select d.doctor_id, 
	concat(d.first_name, " ", d.last_name) as fullname, 
	d.specialty,
    year(admission_date) as attending_year,
    count(*) total_count
    from doctors d 
    join admissions a on d.doctor_id = a.attending_doctor_id
    group by d.doctor_id, fullname, d.specialty, attending_year

SELECT
  first_name,
  last_name
FROM patients
WHERE allergies IS  null;
SELECT category_name, description FROM categories order by category_name
select contact_name, address, city from customers where country not in ('Germany', 'Mexico', 'Spain')

select order_date, shipped_date, customer_id, Freight 
from orders where order_date='2018-02-26'

select employee_id, order_id, customer_id, required_date, shipped_date 
from orders where shipped_date > required_date
select order_id from orders where order_id % 2=0

select city, company_name, contact_name from customers
where city like '%L%' order by contact_name

select company_name, contact_name, fax from customers
where fax is not null

select first_name, last_name, hire_date from employees
order by hire_date desc limit 1

select 
round(avg(unit_price), 2),
SUM(units_in_stock) AS total_units_in_stock,
SUM(CASE WHEN discontinued = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_discontinued_products
from products

select p.product_name, s.company_name, c.category_name 
from products p JOIN categories c ON p.category_id= c.category_id
join suppliers s ON s.supplier_id=p.supplier_id

select c.category_name, round(avg(p.unit_price), 2)
from products p JOIN categories c ON p.category_id= c.category_id
join suppliers s ON s.supplier_id=p.supplier_id group by c.category_name

select 
	CASE when c.city IS NULL Then s.city Else c.city END as city, 
	case WHEN c.company_name IS NULL THEN s.company_name
    	ELSE c.company_name END as company_name,
    case WHEN c.contact_name IS NULL THEN s.contact_name
	    ELse c.contact_name end AS contact_name,
    case when c.customer_id IS NULL then 'suppliers' else 'customers'
         End as relationship
FROM customers c FULL JOIN suppliers s 
ON c.company_name = s.company_name 
and c.city = s.city 
and c.contact_name = s.contact_name
group by c.city, c.company_name, c.contact_name, s.city, s.company_name, s.contact_name

SELECT 
    e.first_name, 
    e.last_name,
    COUNT(o.order_id) AS num_orders,
    (CASE 
        WHEN o.shipped_date <= o.required_date THEN 'On Time'
        ELSE 'Late' 
    END) AS shipped
FROM 
    employees e 
JOIN 
    orders o ON e.employee_id = o.employee_id    
GROUP BY 
    e.first_name, e.last_name, shipped
ORDER BY 
    e.last_name ASC, 
    e.first_name ASC, 
    num_orders DESC;

SELECT year(o.order_date) as order_year,
round(sum(p.unit_price* od.discount * od.quantity),2) as discount_amount
from orders o 
join order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id
join products p ON p.product_id = od.product_id
group by order_year
order by order_year desc

editorText:
SELECT year(o.order_date) as order_year,
round(sum(p.unit_price* od.discount * od.quantity),2) as discount_amount
from orders o 
join order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id
join products p ON p.product_id = od.product_id
group by order_year
order by order_year desc
